抱歉...中文网页暂时无法访问

Sorry...the Chinese site is not available now


本网站所有页面均有人工翻译的中文版。我把中文网站搭建在离中国近的服务器上方便大家访问，域名也在阿里云注册。但是很遗憾域名过期了，但我手机号在中国无法登陆续费。中文版将在今年年底，我回国游玩时重新上线。

I manually translated all the pages on this website into Chinese. I hosted the website near China and registered the domain name in China so that the folks in China can access the website quicker. Unfortunately, I didn't bring my Chinese phone number with me so I can't log in and renew the domain name. The Chinese website will be back online at the end of this year when I visit China.
